articles.title: Trump transition team says several Cabinet picks targeted with bomb threats and swatting - CNN
articles.description: The Trump-Vance transition team said Wednesday that several of President-elect Donald Trump’s Cabinet picks and administration appointees “were targeted in violent, unAmerican threats to their lives and those who live with them” Tuesday night and Wednesday mo…
